attributes.action: Allow all hair salons and all beauty industry to work during lockdown in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
We also like to mention that we are extremely clean we follow every rule to an extreme.
We have never disrespected or disobey any rules given by the government.
We take pride in what we do to care for people and make them happy ,this also helps people with their mental heath. 
We believe we are an import part of everyday life and this country.
attributes.background: We have been extremely effected in the lockdown last time and this time . We have contributed £28.4 billion every year to the UK economy. A lot of us are self implored and are not eligible for government support.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Do not require salons to close due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408

Keep the beauty industry open: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554478
